text: Dalbergia stipulacea is a species of small tree, with the Vietnamese name trắc lá bẹ. The genus Dalbergia is placed in the subfamily Faboideae and tribe Dalbergieae. == Subspecies == The Catalogue of Life lists: * D. s. kurzii * D. s. mogkokensis * D. s. stipulacea == References == Sanjappa M (1992) Legumes of India.
